channel.title: User-Centered Design on JM Santiago III
channel.description: Recent content in User-Centered Design on JM Santiago III

item.title: The AI of Oz: A Framework for Integrating Generative AI in User-Centered Design
item.description: Our conceptual framework integrates Generative AI into the live-prototyping process of User-Centered Design, transforming traditional methodologies by enabling real-time user feedback and AI-driven simulations to enhance design responsiveness and innovation.
